headline: A scalable, cloud-native Git alternative

founders.name: Sasha Medvedovsky, Founder
founders.description:
A software engineer, engineering manager and product manager with 20+ years of experience.
Served as an officer in an elite Israeli cyber-intelligence unit (8200).
Co-founded Leprechaun (bootstrapped to high profitability, sold in 2012) and Adience (sold in 2015 for $25M).
MSc. in Computer Science and MBA from Tel Aviv University, cum laude.

Diversion is unlike any other version control tool built before. We've re-envisioned the user experience, transforming it into a modern cloud service. Spend less time fighting your VCS, and more time creating the things you care about.

## **Painless Scalability**
Effortlessly work with very large files and large repositories without configuration hassle and slowness
![Folder with larger files](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a6b02571fe50c009881737_scalable.svg)

Get notified when the file you start working on is being changed by somebody else. Say good-bye to merge conflicts and lost progress

## Modern Branching and Merging
Diversion supports Git-like branching strategies, with fast branch switching & easy merging. Use feature branches, release branches, or any workflow that works for your team.
![Branch menu](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f1f1dafcc6eb4a9c479c_branches.svg)
## Cloud Sync
Your work is continuously synchronized to the cloud where it is kept safe - even before you commit. If you work with multiple environments, they are always kept up to date with your latest work.
## Granular Permissions
Assign folder-level permissions to users and teams - full, read-only or no access. Allow outside contributions to a project without sharing your entire repository, or creating a separate one.
![Repo Access Settings](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65ad217302af1193ae727c17_granular%20\(2\).webp)
Coming Soon
## Import from Git
Keep your version history by importing from an existing Git repo, for seamless and quick migration. Diversion can also synchronize with Git repositories, allowing teams to work with Git and Diversion alternately. CI/CD is also easy to set up with Jenkins, TC and more.
![Compatible CI Tools](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65ace65f87981212ff1ff9fa_git-comaptible.webp)

## Frequently asked questions
### Is Diversion free?
![minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9f_minus-dropdown.svg)![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9e_plus-dropdown.svg)
Yes!!! Diversion is completely free for up to 5 users and 100GB of storage. You heard it right! Check out [www.diversion.dev/pricing](https://diversion.dev/</indie-pricing>) for details.
### Who is Diversion for?
![minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9f_minus-dropdown.svg)![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9e_plus-dropdown.svg)
Anyone who develops software! And it‚Äôs really great for game development.
### How is Diversion different from Git?
![minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9f_minus-dropdown.svg)![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9e_plus-dropdown.svg)
  * Easy to use - no need to read a book before you start. You can‚Äôt really mess things up like in Git
  * Works well with large files - upload anything you need
  * Synchronizes your changes to the cloud while you work


### How is Diversion different from SVN?
![minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9f_minus-dropdown.svg)![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9e_plus-dropdown.svg)

![minus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9f_minus-dropdown.svg)![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a692daff091fd7cd094903/65a8f48ce9cb6d99dec09e9e_plus-dropdown.svg)

**Company Overview: Diversion**

Founded in 2021 and based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel, Diversion is shaking up the world of version control with its cloud-native, scalable alternative to Git. The company is a proud member of Y Combinator's S22 batch and currently employs a small team of nine talented individuals, led by Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne.

**Mission**

The mission of Diversion is straightforward yet ambitious: to enhance collaboration for software development teams working with code bases of any size, all while improving security, developer experience, and DevOps practices.
